response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an extraordinary price of $750,000. This is a special discount tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
